article_title: To slow coronavirus spread, EU countries and Russia join the list of countries officially closing their borders to all but essential travel
article_description: One of the defining characteristics of the European Union has been its strong policy of taking an open approach when it comes to borders in the region  the EU may be a collection of individual countries  but it works as one  and so when you travel from one to
